description: Configuration management with layered resolution and validation

config_passthrough.notes: Oracle model passthrough via DI singleton. Tool discipline passthrough via ToolDisciplineGuardrail constructor from options.

config_diagnostics.notes: IConfigurationRoot now registered in AddLopenConfiguration for use by lopen config show.

budget_enforcer_wiring.implementation: IBudgetEnforcer wired into WorkflowOrchestrator.CheckBudgetAsync() via DI
budget_enforcer_wiring.tests: WorkflowOrchestratorTests (10 budget tests) + ServiceCollectionExtensionsTests (1 DI test)
budget_enforcer_wiring.notes: Pre-invocation budget check: Ok→proceed, Warning→log+continue, ConfirmationRequired→prompt/halt, Exceeded→auto-save+halt

cli_override_wiring.implementation: GlobalOptions.ApplyConfigOverrides mutates DI-registered ModelOptions and WorkflowOptions
cli_override_wiring.tests: RootCommandTests (4 tests: model override, unattended, max-iterations, default preservation)
cli_override_wiring.notes: CFG-08 (--model), CFG-09 (--unattended), CFG-11 (--max-iterations) CLI flags now wired. ApplyConfigOverrides reads from ParseResult and mutates singleton options before orchestrator invocation.
